title: Beginner Virtual Assistant (Non-Voice, Social Media Tasks)
job_overview:
We’re looking for a Beginner Virtual Assistant to help with basic, non-voice tasks related to social media. No experience needed — just the ability to follow simple instructions and work reliably. 

Responsibilities:
- Assist in doing basic tasks related to social media marketing
- Follow detailed instructions carefully to complete tasks

Requirements:
- No prior experience needed — Fresh graduates are welcome to apply
- Ability to follow directions accurately
- Capable of working independently with minimal supervision
- Reliable and punctual with deadlines

How to Apply:
Share a Dropbox or Google Drive link with your resume and a short intro video about yourself and why you are fit for the role in your application.
